name: CASE_SPEC_INST
description: This table contains information about special needs marked for instruments in a surgical case.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the surgical case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: INSTRUMENT_C_NAME
columns.description: This column contains special needs category choices that have been made about instruments in the case record.
